title: My Soviet Union - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Historical   Psychological   Supernatural
tags: Army   Cunning Protagonist   Domestic Affairs   Male Protagonist   Military   Nationalism   Politics   Pregnancy   Racism   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Time Travel   Wars
author: Green Hills White Pines   青山白松
description:
Stalin: “The Pope! How many divisions has he got?”

Khrushchev: “We will bury you!”

Brezhnev: “We must build a developed socialist state!”

Serov: “Hmph! The Soviets have already seen through everything!”

The enemy of the people, should all taste the iron first of Communism!

This book is about the cold war! This is not Red Alert, please avoid while following the rules.

Xie Jie, a Chinese man living in the 21st century, was reincarnated into the body of Yuri Yefimovich Serov, a 26-year-old Azerbaijani working as the First Secretary of the Azerbaijan Young Pioneers.>
